thread.title: Dr Who: Peter Capaldi to play Doctor no more from end of this year
thread.title_full: Dr Who: Peter Capaldi to play Doctor no more from end of this year

author: Nathanael Cooper
title: Dr Who: Peter Capaldi to play Doctor no more from end of this year
text:
License article Dr Who: Peter Capaldi to play Doctor no more from end of this year 
This season will be the final one as The Doctor for Scottish actor Peter Capaldi, he has announced. More 
Peter Capaldi is stepping out of the Whoniverse. 
The Scottish actor, who has played the title role in the iconic sci-fi series Dr Who since 2013, revealed on BBC Radio 2 on Monday night (UK time) that he will finish in the role at the end of the current series, his third. Entertainment news highlights Entertainment news highlights 
Flume takes out top spot in this year's Triple J Hottest 100, Nicole Kidman's Lion and Mel Gibson's Hacksaw Ridge nab six Oscar nominations each and police arrest actor Shia LaBeouf at an anti-Trump art exhibition. Up Next SAG awards get political SAG awards get political 
Hidden Figures dominate Screen Actor Guild awards, with many using the opportunity to denounce Donald Trump's recent travel ban executive order. Up Next G'day USA Gala red carpet Play Video G'day USA Gala red carpet G'day USA Gala red carpet 
The creme de la creme of Australia's entertainment industry descend on Los Angeles for the 2017 G'day USA Black Tie Gala. Up Next I'm A Celebrity Australia 2017: Cast skydive into jungle Play Video I'm A Celebrity Australia 2017: Cast ... I'm A Celebrity Australia 2017: Cast skydive into jungle 
Series three of Network Ten's I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here! has kicked off with some cast members skydiving into the South African jungle from a plane. Vision courtesy Network Ten. The famous 1979 Vietnam War flick is being turned into a role playing game, but the developers need $900,000 to get it over the line. Up Next Elton John to write Devil Wears Prada musical Play Video Elton John to write Devil Wears Prada ... Elton John to write Devil Wears Prada musical 
Pop star Elton John and Playwright Paul Rudnick are tasked to create a Broadway adaptation of The Devil Wears Prada . Up Next Triple J's hottest 100: Top five tracks Play Video Triple J's hottest 100: Top five tracks

Flume takes out top spot in this year's Triple J Hottest 100, Nicole Kidman's Lion and Mel Gibson's Hacksaw Ridge nab six Oscar nominations each and police arrest actor Shia LaBeouf at an anti-Trump art exhibition. 
In the surprise announcement, Capaldi told BBC's Jo Whiley that it was a difficult decision to make. 
"I feel sad, I love Dr Who , it's a fantastic program to work on and it has been a huge pleasure to work with a family," he said. SHARE Peter Capaldi is stepping down as The Doctor. 
"I feel it's time for me to move on to different challenges." 
Capaldi made his first appearance in the role in the 50th anniversary special Day of the Doctor . He then took over the role when the character regenerated from Matt Smith's interpretation to his in the 2013 Christmas Special. Advertisement 
Capaldi's performance as The Doctor has been described as "wise and thoughtful" by The Guardian, with Radio Times saying "Peter Capaldi's one-man show is an instant classic". 
The tenth season of the rebooted series, which begins airing in April, will mark Capaldi's final . The yet-to-be-shot Christmas Special will be his final episode and will feature the regeneration of the character as the new doctor. A replacement is yet to be named. SHARE
